accessibility.text: When the Fed sells bonds: Quantitative Tightening (QT)
Monetary Policy Tools
1. Open Market Operations
Also called “Balance Sheet” Policy or Quantitative Easing/Tightening
When the Fed buys bonds: Quantitative Easing (QE)
When the Fed sells bonds: Quantitative Tightening (QT)
